release-updates.text: We've made some changes on our platform. Curious to read about it?

cookie.consent: By clicking "Accept All Cookies", you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation and analyze site usage.
cookie.settings: When visiting a website, information can be stored on your browser in the form of cookies. This information can be about you, your preferences and your device. Mostly, this information is used to make the website work as good as possible. Some websites use it for marketing purposes. As Alkemio does not allow any advertisement on its website, we only distinguish two types of cookies.
cookie.technical: Technically necessary cookies: enable you to navigate and use the basis functions and to store preferences.
cookie.analysis: Analysis cookies: enable us to determine how visitors interact with our services in order to improve user experience.

common.name: Name
common.field-min-length: This field must be minimum of {{min}} characters
common.field-max-length: This field must be maximum of {{max}} characters
common.question: Question
common.title: Title

toolbar.image.dropFileText: Drop the file or click to upload

callout.draftNotice: DRAFT - This Callout is only visible for admins.
callout.delete-confirm-text: All aspects, canvases and messages under the Callout will also be deleted.
callout.permission-helptext: Use the switch below to close this callout for new entries.

share-dialog.title: Copy the link below to share this {{entity}}

tagline.title: Tagline
tagline.description: Explain in one sentence what this Hub is about.

background.title: Background
background.description: Give a brief overview of the need for this Hub and how it came about.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: What will this Hub change? How will people and organizations be affected?

vision.title: What is this community about?
vision.description: What is the frame of reference for this Hub?

who.title: Who should be involved?
who.description: Think of individuals, organizations, public bodies, research institutes, etc.

displayName.title: Title
displayName.description: Try to keep it short, descriptive and engaging

tagline.title: Challenge Statement
tagline.description: Explain in one sentence what this Challenge is about. It is also possible to frame it as a question, starting with 'How might we...'

background.title: Current Reality
background.description: Give a brief impression of the current state of the Challenge. Think of the 'What, where, when and who'.

impact.title: Additional context
impact.description: Give a brief overview of how this Challenge is embedded in the wider picture. What is its impact? Why is it here?

vision.title: Future Vision
vision.description: What does success look like? What should a solution to this Challenge comprise?

who.title: Who should contribute
who.description: Think of individuals, organizations, public bodies, research institutes, etc.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Enter words that are key to the Challenge to make it stand out and easier to find.

displayName.title: Title
displayName.description: Try to keep it short, descriptive and engaging

tagline.title: Tagline
tagline.description: In one sentence, explain what this Opportunity is about.

background.title: Background
background.description: Give a brief overview of how this Opportunity was identified and how it is embedded in the wider picture.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: What will this Opportunity change? How will people and organizations be affected, for good or bad?

vision.title: Description
vision.description: Describe the idea and the impact it will have on the Challenge. Please note that this is a living document, it can be updated any time.

who.title: Who is involved?
who.description: Describe the people and organizations who are currently working on this Opportunity.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Enter words that are key to your Opportunity to make it stand out and easier to find.

validations.minLength: {{field}} should be at least {{min}} symbols long
validations.alphaNumeric: {{field}} can contain only lower case latin characters, numbers and hyphens
validations.nonBlank: {{field}} must not consist of just spaces

definition.title: Definition
definition.placeholder: Here you can paste the description from Xstate Visualizer with the various lifecycle states

error-display.title: Ooops!
error-display.contact-support-sentence: If this problem persists, please contact support.

lifecycle-visualizer.error: The definition was not able to be visualized

activity-tooltip.headline: Alkemio is growing! In total, the platform now hosts:

info-step.title: Details
info-step.type-comments-help: Select ‘Comments’ when you want people to answer in a simple text format, like a messageboard
info-step.type-cards-help: Select ‘Cards’ when you want people to answer in a card format.
info-step.type-canvases-help: Select ‘Canvases’ when you want people to answer on a visual whiteboard, allowing them to draw and use text.
info-step.unique-title-validation-text: This title is already used for another $t(common.callout)

callout-edit.type-edit-help-text: This will only affect new entries, yet submitted cards will not be changed

type-step.title: The type of the additional context to add.
type-step.error: Error occurred while loading the types
type-step.label: Card Type
type-step.type-help-text-short: Please choose the Card type that best matches the context you wish to share.

info-step.title: Details
info-step.tags-help-text: Add free form tags to help quickly convey the key information about the Card. Good tags also help make the Card easier to find in searches.
info-step.name-help-text: A descriptive name for this Card.
info-step.unique-name-validation-text: ${path} is already used in another Card

create-step.title: Create
create-step.name: Name
create-step.explanation: By completing this step the Card will be created and you will have the option to add visuals.

visuals-step.title: Visuals
visuals-step.headline: Congratulations, you have now successfully created an Card!
visuals-step.explanation: To further personalize your Card, please consider adding visuals such as a Banner to the card.
visuals-step.bottom-note: You will still have the possibility to change these visuals under the settings tab as well as adding references and a Banner for the Dashboard card.

credential-share-request-dialog.title: Share your verified credentials
credential-share-request-dialog.content: Please select the credentials you would like to store on your Alkemio hosted wallet.

alkemio-user-credential-offer-dialog.title: Alkemio User
alkemio-user-credential-offer-dialog.content: This credential allows the holder to prove that they are a verified Alkemio user.

alkemio-community-member-credential-offe.title: Alkemio Community Member
alkemio-community-member-credential-offe.content: This credential allows the holder to prove that they are a member of the specified community within Alkemio.

edit-members.no-available-members: No users available to add; please check members of containing community

dialog-apply-parent.title: Want to join the parent Hub?
dialog-apply-parent.body: To join '{{challengeName}}' you must join '{{hubName}}' hub first. Please add the challenge you want to join in the hub's application form.

dialog-parent-app-pending.title: Parent application pending!
dialog-parent-app-pending.body: To join '{{challengeName}}' you must join '{{hubName}}' hub first. There is already an application pending for that '{{hubName}}', so you can also submit a parallel application for '{{challengeName}}'.

dialog-join.title: Join community
dialog-join.body: You can join this community without applying for a membership, because you have the right credentials.
dialog-join.accept-terms: I understand and accept the terms and conditions for community members

dialog-join-parent.title: Join parent community
dialog-join-parent.body: You can join this community without applying for a membership, because you have the right credentials. But first you have to join the parent community and accept the terms and conditions there, then you can join this one.

backdrop.private: Please become a member to access {{blockName}}
backdrop.authentication: Please sign in to see details about the {{blockName}}.

referenceSegment.title: References
referenceSegment.url-helper-text:
Keep in mind that all uploaded files become accessible to everyone with the link and can only be deleted by the Alkemio team.
Click here for the terms and conditions.

confirm-dialog.title: Uploading a document
confirm-dialog.confirm-text: Please make sure that this document complies with Alkemio’s content standards. <aup>Click here</aup> to see the Acceptable Usage Policy (section 7).
confirm-dialog.checkbox-label: This document meets Alkemio’s Terms & Conditions

nameID.placeholder: Unique textual identifier, used for URL paths. Note: cannot be modified after creation.

legalEntityName.placeholder: Enter the legal name of this organization

errorblock.message: Sorry, an error occurred while loading {{blockName}}.

communityUpdates.title: Let your community know what's next

remove.confirmationContent: Removing a community update is an irreversible. Are you sure you want to continue?

contributions.title: Contributions
contributions.help: The Hubs and Challenges that this organization is contributing to

discussion.cant-post: You can't reply to this discussion

description.title: Comment on this discussion
description.placeholder: Add further information on the discussion here

tooltip.markdown-help:
You can add formatting to your comment,
for example:
Bold text: **bold**
Italic text: *italic*
Header: ##Title
Link: [text](url)

description.title: Further information
description.placeholder: Add further information on the discussion here

discussions.no-data-create: No discussions. Create a new discussion
discussions.no-data-join: No discussions. Please join the community to create a discussion

help-text.title: Be careful! By updating the Innovation Flow, the current state will be (re)set to the first state of the selected flow.

description.title: Are you sure you want to change the innovation flow? This may change the set of states for this challenge/opportunity and will (re)set the state to the first state of the selected Innovation Flow.

dashboard.description: Here you can see the summary for this {{entity}}. Navigate through the other tabs to see more detailed information!

about.description: Here you can explore the context of this {{entity}}, as well as the community.

community.description: Here you can explore the Community. See the Users and Organizations that are contributing, as well as updates that have been shared.

explore.description: Here you can contribute your insights to understanding the context. It is about surfacing up the wisdom of the community.

discussions.description: Here you can read and participate in discussions around this {{entity}}.

canvases.description: Canvases can be seen as digital whiteboards. Here you can create a canvas for this {{entity}} as well as find ones created by the others.

profile.description: Here you can edit the profile for this {{entity}}.

context.description: Here you can edit the context for this {{entity}}.

community.description: Here you can edit the community settings for this {{entity}}.

communications.description: Here you can post updates that will be visible to all members of this {{entity}}.

authorization.description: Here you can tweak authorization settings for this {{entity}}.

templates.description: Here you can create and edit templates for this {{entity}}.
templates.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{template}} from the hub? You can also edit the information of this template.

import.title: Template Library: {{templateType}}
import.subtitle: Find templates to use in your hub, challenge or opportunity. Select the template and click ‘Import’ to add it to your Template set.
import.no-templates: Couldn't find any Template of this type

my-profile.description: Here you can edit your profile details.

membership.description: Here you can see the membership information.

organizations.description: Here you can see the organizations that your user is associated with.

notifications.description: Here you can edit your notifications preferences.

innovation-flow.description: Here you change the status of this Opportunity or choose a different Flow Template to follow.

feedback.title: Give feedback on this community context

search.title: See who's contributing
search.subtitle: Have a look at the organizations and users that are contributing to the Challenges, Opportunities and Hubs on the platform.

search.subheader: Find relevant users, organizations, groups and not least Challenges!
search.alternativesubheader: Need help? Find relevant users, organizations, groups and not least Challenges!
search.more-results: There are more search results. Please use more specific search criteria to narrow down the results
search.user-not-logged: Login or Register to include users in your search results

search.title: Explore Public Challenges
search.subtitle: Enter your search terms (e.g. 'innovation') below to find matching challenges. Please note that on Alkemio, there are both public and private challenge hubs. Here you can find all challenges from the public hubs. Challenges from private hubs are visible when you are signed in and a member of that particular hub.
search.no-results: No results matched your search terms.

side-note.title: The Alkemio Structure
side-note.description: At Alkemio, all Challenges are part of a Hub. Each Hub has it's specific frame of reference, in which Challenges are used to understand the issues at hand.

my-search.title: Explore other Challenges accessible to you
my-search.subtitle: On Alkemio, there are both public and private hubs. Here you’ll find all challenges from public Hubs and private Hubs that you are a member of. Enter your search terms (e.g. ‘innovation’) below to find matching challenges.

my.title: My challenges
my.subtitle: Here you'll find the challenges that you are contributing to.

other.title: Challenges within My Hubs
other.subtitle: Here you'll find the other challenges hosted by the hubs that you are member of.

welcome.head: Empowering society. The platform to succeed in working on challenges, together.
welcome.join: Want to join the community and see more?

existing-user.subheader: Welcome back! Continue where you left off and start exploring new challenges.

new-to-alkemio.subheader: Easy for you to engage in effective and meaningful ways. Find solutions to challenges.

hub.subheader:
Each Hub contains one or more Challenges, providing shared context and community for Challenges hosted there.
A space to coordinate and collaborate. Connect.
hub.body: Membership: Each Hub has members that are contributing. Become a member via the Hub page.
hub.body1: Visibility: Most Hubs are public and hence fully visible to everyone. For private Hubs, the content is only available after becoming a member.

my-hubs.subheader: This section show you the Hubs that you are a member of.

organizations.subheader: The entities that want to bring innnovation.

contributors-section.title: See who is driving Challenges on Alkemio

footer.headline: More about Alkemio? Visit our website, contact us or take a look at our Github repository

verified-status.help: Verification status: has the identity and information about this Organization been formally verified

hub.title: Hub
hub.archived-hub-notice: This Hub is currently archived. Interested in bringing it back to life? <contact>Click here to contact Alkemio</contact>.
hub.demo-hub-notice: This is a Demo Hub. <alkemio>Click here to collaborate in active Hubs</alkemio>.

application.title: Application to join {{entity}} "{{name}}"
application.subheader: Please fill out the questions below, which together with your profile will be sent to the relevant party.
application.finish: Thank you for completing your application for

challenges.no-data: No challenges available for this hub
challenges.description: Here you can explore the Challenges hosted in this Hub. Filter by key words to show just the topics you care about.

opportunities.description: Here you can explore the Opportunities that have been identified for making progress on the Challenge. Filter by key words to show just the topics you care about.
opportunities.body-missing: No opportunities found for this challenge

community.description: Here you can explore the Community. See the Users that are contributing, as well as updates that have been shared.

agreements.description:
Agreements are the formation of concrete next steps to be taken. This new functionality will be available soon.

Ideas, suggestions? Please reach out!

member-organizations.no-data: No organization is contributing at this time

canvas.subheader: Create your custom visualization and share it with others.
canvas.no-canvases: No canvases have been created yet. Be the first to add one.

state.available: You are free to work on this canvas

delete.confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to delete this canvas? The action is irreversible.

steps.templating: Choose from the list of templates if you want to use it as a blueprint for your canvas.
steps.completing: The canvas will be created with the following parameters

create-dialog.no-template-selected: To see a preview of the template please select one.

template.no-templates: There are no templates defined here yet. Be the first to add one.
template.how-to: To create a template create a new canvas or use an existing one and save it as a template.

hub.templatesSubheader: The templates defined in this hub can be used in every challenge and opportunity that this hub hosts.

challenge.templatesSubheader: The templates defined in this challenge can be used in every opportunity that is in the scope of this challenge.

about.title: Reimagining collaboration
about.description: Alkemio puts the Challenges central, each Challenge providing a central, neutral place for collaboration.

error.title: Ooops!
error.line2: Please check that your server ({{graphQLEndpoint}}) is available, and reload the page.
error.line3: If the error persists please contact support.

four-ou-four.message: The resource you are looking for could not be found.

registration.header: Create an account to start using Alkemio
registration.terms: I accept the <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

registration-success.subheader: Nearly there! One last step is to verify your email.

verification-success.header: Thank you for verifying your email address!
verification-success.subheader: Your profile is now fully activated on the platform. Enjoy!
verification-success.message: Please do consider filling out all aspects of your [profile](/profile) - helps with both applying to join communities and with others being able to connect with you.

recovery.message: Please enter your email address below to receive a link to reset your password.

verification.message: To receive a new verification email, please enter your email address below.

verification-required.message: Please check your inbox for an email with instructions.
verification-required.link: (If you have not received an email, click on this link to send again)

communities.help: Communities the user is a part of

associated-organizations.title: Associated Organizations
associated-organizations.help: Organizations who the user is related to

verifiable-credentials.title: Verifiable Credentials
verifiable-credentials.help: Credentials that the user holds issued by trusted parties

your-credentials.title: My Verifiable Credentials
your-credentials.description: Alkemio caches your verifiable credentials in your cloud hosted wallet. The credentials you share will grant you privileges in communities across the platform.

authentication-required.header: The page you are trying to reach requires you to be logged in.
authentication-required.subheader: Please sign-in or register to continue!

general.title: General
general.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding receiving messages

user-administration.title: Platform Administration
user-administration.subtitle: This section is only visible to users that are a global admin on the platform

community-administration.title: Community administration
community-administration.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding the community administration

help-dialog.title: Looking for help?
help-dialog.text:
We want to help you successfully use the Alkemio platform, and to do so we want to make the process of using it and interacting easier. This is how you can have an impact on the topics you care about.

Click on the icons below to find answers to your questions, contact the Alkemio team for support or just get started!
help-dialog.tips-and-tricks: Looking for tips & tricks? Find them in the blog posts here!

messages.successfully-recovered-password: Please enter a new password within the next 15 minutes to complete your password reset.
messages.verification-flow-expired: The verification link has expired. Please request a fresh one by submitting your email once again.
messages.recovery-flow-expired: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one by submitting your email once again.

errors.bad-user-input: Invalid value in the submitted form.
errors.bad-user-input-withfield: The value of '{{field}}' is not valid.

dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-join: No discussions available. Please join the community to create a discussion

type.title: Card Type
type.help-text: What type of information do you want to share?

cardLocation.title: Card location
cardLocation.label: Contributing to Callout
cardLocation.reminder: Be careful changing the Card’s location. Moving the Card to another Callout will make it disappear from the current Callout. This might make it difficult for people, including the person who created this card, to retrieve it. Note that you can only move Cards within the same Hub, Challenge or Opportunity.
cardLocation.success: Successfully moved card to the new Callout.
cardLocation.error: Something went wrong when moving the card, please try again.
